you-sent: Here is the information you have sent us

correct-mistakes.header: You have reported problems with your BRP
correct-mistakes.paragraph-one: Thank you for contacting the BRP management unit about your BRP mistakes.
correct-mistakes.paragraph-two-triage: Somebody from the BRP management unit will contact you within 1 working day about the issue you have reported.
correct-mistakes.paragraph-two: Somebody from the BRP management unit will contact you within 5 working days about the issue you have reported.
correct-mistakes.paragraph-three: If you have an issue with multiple BRPs, for example your spouse's BRP or your child's BRP, then you must report the issues with each BRP separately at www.gov.uk/brp
correct-mistakes.paragraph-four: This is an automated email, so please don't reply.
